to.shell_command:

  tell application "System Events"
    tell process "Microsoft Word"
      set frontmost to true
      click menu item "Comment" of menu "Insert" of menu bar 1
    end tell
  end tell'

osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events"
    tell process "Highlights"
      set frontmost to true
      click menu item "Back" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1
    end tell
  end tell'

osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events"

      set frontmost to true
      click menu item "Forward" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1
    end tell
  end tell'

rules.description: (Apps) Hammerspoon: ‚åòQ ‚Üí Close instead of Quit, ‚åòK ‚Üí Clear Console, ‚åò‚áßC ‚Üí copy last command

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events"
  tell process "Drafts"
    click menu item "Manage Actions..." of menu "Actions" of menu bar 1
  end tell
end tell'

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events"
  tell process "Drafts"
    click menu item "Move to Archive" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
  end tell
end tell'
afplay "/System/Library/Sounds/Tink.aiff"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events"
  tell process "Drafts"
    click menu item "Next Draft" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
  end tell
end tell'

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events"
  tell process "Drafts"
    click menu item "Previous Draft" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
  end tell
end tell'

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
  click first menu item of menu of menu item "Recent Folders" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1
end tell'

to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    click menu item "Rename‚Ä¶" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
  end tell'

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder"
    repeat while window 2 exists
      close window 2
    end repeat
  end tell'

osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder"
    if the selection is {} then return
    activate
  end tell
  delay 0.1
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    tell value of attribute "AXFocusedUIElement" to perform action "AXShowMenu"
  end tell'

to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e'
  tell application "Finder"
    if (number of windows is not 2) then
      display notification "" with title "Failure" subtitle "‚ö†Ô∏è Not exactly two windows"
      beep
    else if (the selection is {}) then
      display notification "" with title "Failure" subtitle "‚ö†Ô∏è No selection"
      beep
    else
      set otherWin to (target of window 2 as alias)
      repeat with f in (selection as list)
        move f to otherWin
      end repeat
    end if
  end tell'

folder=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (target of Finder window 1 as alias)')
newFile="$folder/new-file"
while [[ -e "$newFile" ]] ; do
  newFile="$newFile-1"
done
touch "$newFile"
open -R "$newFile"

to.shell_command:
selection=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as alias)')
ext=${selection##*.}
if [[ "$ext" == "bkp" ]]; then
  newName=$(echo "$selection" | rev | cut -c5- | rev) # can't use bash expansion here
  mv "$selection" "$newName"	
else
  mv "$selection" "$selection.bkp"	
fi

selection=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as alias)')
open -R "$(readlink -f "$selection")"

sel=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as alias)')
if [[ -f "$sel" ]] ; then
    ln -sf "$sel" "${sel}-symlink"
    open -R "${sel}-symlink"
elif [[ -d "$sel" ]] ; then
    # cannot use bash expansion here, therefore rev & cut
    sel="$(echo "$sel" | rev | cut -c2- | rev)"
    ln -sf "$sel" "${sel}-symlink"
    open -R "${sel}-symlink"
fi

to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    click menu item "Compress" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
  end tell'

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    click menu item "Compress" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
  end tell'

osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"

  end tell'

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    click menu item "Forward" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1
  end tell'
osascript -e 'display notification "File path" with title "‚úÖ Copied"'
osascript -e 'display notification "File name" with title "‚úÖ Copied"'

GIT_OPTIONAL_LOCKS=0
SEL=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder"
  set sel to (item 1 of (selection as list) as alias)
  return POSIX path of sel
end tell')
[[ -f "$SEL" ]] || exit 1
cd "$(dirname "$SEL")"

BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current)
ROOT_PATH=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)
ROOT_LEN=${#ROOT_PATH}
REMOTE_URL="$(git remote -v | head -n1 | cut -f2 | cut -d' ' -f1 | sed -e's/:/\//' -e 's/git@/https:\/\//' -e 's/\.git//')"
PATH_IN_REPO=${SEL:$ROOT_LEN}
PATH_IN_REPO=$(osascript -l JavaScript -e "encodeURIComponent('$PATH_IN_REPO')")

URL="$REMOTE_URL/blob/$BRANCH/$PATH_IN_REPO"
echo "$URL" | pbcopy
open "$URL"

osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder"
    activate
    open the trash # opens the unified trash (iCloud trash + user trash)
end tell '

target="$HOME/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/File Hub/"
osascript -e "
  set the_folder to (\"$target\") as POSIX file
  tell application \"Finder\"
    activate
    if front Finder window exists then
      set target of front Finder window to the_folder
    else
      open the_folder
    end if
  end tell"

FRONT_APP=$(osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to return name of first process whose frontmost is true')
if [[ "$FRONT_APP" == "neovide" ]]; then
  echo "vim.cmd.wq()" >"/tmp/nvim-automation"
else
  killall "$FRONT_APP"
fi

while pgrep -q "$FRONT_APP"; do sleep 0.03; done

if [[ "$FRONT_APP" == "neovide" ]]; then
  sleep 0.03
  export PATH=/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin/:$PATH
  # bwipeout necessary due to empty buffer created before jumping to '0
  neovide --frame=buttonless --notabs --geometry=101x32 -- -c "execute \"normal! '0\" | bwipeout #"
else
  open -a "$FRONT_APP"
fi

osascript -e 'display notification "" with title "Restarting Alfred‚Ä¶"'
killall -KILL "Alfred"
killall "Alfred Preferences"
while pgrep -q "Alfred"; do sleep 0.1; done
sleep 0.1
open -a Alfred\ 5
osascript -e 'tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" to search'

rules.description: (Mouse) Right-Click (briefly): Open link in new background tab (Browser)
(Mouse) R (tap): Open link in new background tab (RSS Readers)

rules.description: ‚öíÔ∏è R-‚åò (tap): go to end of line
‚öíÔ∏è  L-‚å• (tap): go to beginning of line

to.shell_command:
export PATH=/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin/:$PATH
spt playback --like | sed 's/üîÄ//' | sed 's/‚ñ∂Ô∏è//' |
xargs -I {} osascript -e 'display notification "{}" with title "üéµ Spotify"'

i=0
while ! pgrep "Spotify"; do
  open -a "Spotify"
  sleep 0.2
  i=$((i + 1))
  [[ $i -gt 30 ]] && exit 1
done
osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" to previous track'

i=0
while ! pgrep "Spotify"; do
  open -a "Spotify"
  sleep 0.2
  i=$((i + 1))
  [[ $i -gt 30 ]] && exit 1
done
osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" to playpause'

i=0
while ! pgrep "Spotify"; do
  open -a "Spotify"
  sleep 0.2
  i=$((i + 1))
  [[ $i -gt 30 ]] && exit 1
done
osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" to next track'
